title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Skills: Social Domain Microlearning Design Based on Cognitive Task Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic sociological theories and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analyze cognitive load levels by categorizing the complexity of social phenomena into three stages (simple-intermediate-complex).
Learners can design a social problem-solving activity plan by applying Cognitive Task Analysis (CTA) techniques.
Learners can develop mobile learning interactions based on analyzed cognitive processes and mental model schemata.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
